title: Henri Rousseau: le douanier (TEFC)
creator_credit: Lo Duca, F Tavano and Ecrans Modernes
brief_description: Portrays the life of the French primitive painter, Henri Rousseau, as reflected in his paintings. The film discusses the “phenomenon of Rousseau” in the evolution of the art of painting, shows the life of his imagination and reviews his work according to its inner logic.
creator_credit_for_label: Lo Duca, F Tavano and Ecrans Modernes
